identificationModule.briefTitle: Open Label Study Telmisartan and Amlodipine in Hypertension
identificationModule.officialTitle: An Open Label Follow-up Trial of the Efficacy and Safety of Chronic Administration of the Combination of Telmisartan 40mg + Amlodipine 5mg or the Combination of Telmisartan 80mg + Amlodipine 5mg Tablets Alone or in Combination With Other Antihypertensive Medications in Patients With Hypertension.

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The primary objective of this trial is to assess the efficacy and safety of the fixed dose combinations telmisartan 40 mg / amlodipine 5 mg (T40/A5) or telmisartan 80 mg / amlodipine 5 mg (T80/A5) during long-term open-label treatment.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Trough Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) Control
primaryOutcomes.description: The number of patients who reach the target DBP of \<90mmHg
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Trough Seated Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) Control
secondaryOutcomes.description: The number of patients who reach the target SBP of \<140mmHg
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change From Baseline in Trough Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure
secondaryOutcomes.description: Change from baseline to the end of study in trough DBP. Baseline is defined as visit 3 of trial 1235.5.
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in DBP From Last Available Trough in 1235.5 to Last Available Trough in 1235.7
secondaryOutcomes.description: The difference between the last available troughs represents the additional reduction in DBP in this study
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change From Baseline in Trough Seated Systolic Blood Pressure
secondaryOutcomes.description: Change from baseline to the end of study in trough SBP. Baseline is defined as visit 3 of trial 1235.5.
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in SBP From Last Available Trough in 1235.5 to Last Available Trough in 1235.7
secondaryOutcomes.description: The difference between the last available troughs represents the additional reduction in SBP in this study
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.description: The number of patients who reach the target DBP of \<90mmHg or had a reduction in DBP \>= 10mmHg
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.description: The number of patients who reach the target SBP of \<140mmHg or had a reduction in SBP \>= 15 mmHg
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.description: The number of patients who reach predefined BP categories
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

secondaryOutcomes.description: Time from first intake of medication to first intake of an antihypertensive other than the study drug
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Patients Requiring Additional Antihypertensive Therapy to Achieve DBP Control
secondaryOutcomes.description: The number of patients with DBP control (DBP\<90 mmHg). Last trough DBP measurement before taking additional antihypertensive compared to last trough DBP taken on treatment
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Additional Reduction in DBP by Use of Additional Antihypertensive Therapy
secondaryOutcomes.description: Difference in trough DBP from last visit before add-on therapy and last visit during 1235.7
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Additional Reduction in SBP by Use of Additional Antihypertensive Therapy
secondaryOutcomes.description: Difference in trough SBP from last visit before add-on therapy and last visit during 1235.7
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Trough DBP Control Pre- and Post- Uptitration
secondaryOutcomes.description: The number of patients with DBP control (DBP\<90 mmHg). Last trough DBP measurement before uptitration to Telmisartan 80mg compared to first trough DBP taken after uptitration
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. patients aged at least 18 years
2. diagnosis of essential hypertension and blood pressure not adequately controlled before enrolment in the preceding trial.
3. failure to respond to six weeks treatment with Amlodipine 5 mg in the run-in period of the preceding trial.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. pre-menopausal women who are not surgically sterile; or are nursing or pregnant; or are not practising acceptable means of birth control or do not plan to continue using acceptable means of birth control throughout the study
2. development of any medical condition in the preceding trial that in the investigator's opinion could be worsened by treatment with either Telmisartan 40 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg or Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg
3. discontinuation from the preceding trial because of any adverse event or any other reason
4. known or suspected secondary hypertension
5. mean seated Systolic Blood Pressure =\> 180 mmHg and/or mean seated Diastolic Blood Pressure =\> 120 mmHg at any visit

references.citation: Neldam S, Edwards C, Lang M, Jones R; TEAMSTA-5 and TEAMSTA-10 Investigators. Long-Term Tolerability and Efficacy of Single-Pill Combinations of Telmisartan 40-80 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 or 10 mg in Patients Whose Blood Pressure Was Not Initially Controlled by Amlodipine 5-10 mg: Open-Label, Long-Term Follow-Ups of the TEAMSTA-5 and TEAMSTA-10 Studies. Curr Ther Res Clin Exp. 2012 Feb;73(1-2):65-84. doi: 10.1016/j.curtheres.2012.02.004.

outcomeMeasures.title: Trough Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) Control
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of patients who reach the target DBP of \<90mmHg
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: The full analysis set of patients. All patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

outcomeMeasures.title: Trough Seated Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) Control
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of patients who reach the target SBP of \<140mmHg
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: The full analysis set of patients. All patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Trough Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline to the end of study in trough DBP. Baseline is defined as visit 3 of trial 1235.5.
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: All patients who took at least one dose of study medication, have a trough baseline measurement (Visit 3 1235.5) and at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in DBP From Last Available Trough in 1235.5 to Last Available Trough in 1235.7
outcomeMeasures.description: The difference between the last available troughs represents the additional reduction in DBP in this study
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: Full Analysis Set (FAS) included patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Trough Seated Systolic Blood Pressure
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline to the end of study in trough SBP. Baseline is defined as visit 3 of trial 1235.5.
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: Full Analysis Set (FAS) included patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in SBP From Last Available Trough in 1235.5 to Last Available Trough in 1235.7
outcomeMeasures.description: The difference between the last available troughs represents the additional reduction in SBP in this study
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: All patients who took at least one dose of study medication, have a trough baseline measurement (Last value on treatment in 1235.5) and at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

outcomeMeasures.title: Trough Seated DBP Response
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of patients who reach the target DBP of \<90mmHg or had a reduction in DBP \>= 10mmHg
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: The full analysis set of patients. All patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

outcomeMeasures.title: Trough Seated SBP Response
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of patients who reach the target SBP of \<140mmHg or had a reduction in SBP \>= 15 mmHg
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: The full analysis set of patients. All patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

outcomeMeasures.title: Trough Blood Pressure (BP) Normality Classes
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of patients who reach predefined BP categories
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: The full analysis set of patients. All patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: End of study (34 weeks or last value on treatment)

classes.title: Normal (SBP<130 and DBP<85 mmHg and not optimal)
High-normal (SBP<140 DBP<90 mmHg and not normal)

outcomeMeasures.title: Time to First Additional Antihypertensive
outcomeMeasures.description: Time from first intake of medication to first intake of an antihypertensive other than the study drug
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: Patients from the full analysis set who took additional antihypertensive medication as defined by the investigator. Full analysis set defined as all patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Patients Requiring Additional Antihypertensive Therapy to Achieve DBP Control
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of patients with DBP control (DBP\<90 mmHg). Last trough DBP measurement before taking additional antihypertensive compared to last trough DBP taken on treatment
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: Patients from the full analysis set who took additional antihypertensive medication as defined by the investigator. Full analysis set defined as all patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Additional Reduction in DBP by Use of Additional Antihypertensive Therapy
outcomeMeasures.description: Difference in trough DBP from last visit before add-on therapy and last visit during 1235.7
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: Patients from the full analysis set who took additional antihypertensive medication as defined by the investigator. Full analysis set defined as all patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Additional Reduction in SBP by Use of Additional Antihypertensive Therapy
outcomeMeasures.description: Difference in trough SBP from last visit before add-on therapy and last visit during 1235.7
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: Patients from the full analysis set who took additional antihypertensive medication as defined by the investigator. Full analysis set defined as all patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Trough DBP Control Pre- and Post- Uptitration
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of patients with DBP control (DBP\<90 mmHg). Last trough DBP measurement before uptitration to Telmisartan 80mg compared to first trough DBP taken after uptitration
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: Patients from the full analysis set who up-titrated to the higher dose of telmisartan 80 mg and amlodipine 10 mg. Full analysis set defined as all patients who took at least one dose of study medication and have at least one on treatment BP measurement 20-30 hours post dose
outcomeMeasures.timeFrame: At any point during open-label treatment

adverseEventsModule.timeFrame: From day of first dose until one day after last dose
adverseEventsModule.description: Safety analysis treatment groups were based upon actual treatment received at the time of the event regardless of add-on antihypertensive. All patients started the study on Telmisartan 40mg and amlodipine 5mg and were up-titrated according to DBP response. Explaining the large number of patients exposed to T40/A5 compared to T80/A5

seriousEvents.organSystem: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)
Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certainAgreement.otherDetails: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.
